articles.description: The former England manager has said Harry Maguire, the United skipper, should have played more games this season with the World Cup peering into view.
articles.content:
Harry Maguire has been backed to keep his starting place for England at this winter's World Cup - by a former Three Lions manager. United skipper Maguire has endured a tough campaign so far.

articles.title: Red Bull handed $7 million fine, 10% wind-tunnel reduction for budget-cap breach - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Red Bull has been handed a $7 million fine and a 10% reduction in wind-tunnel testing time for next season as punishment for breaching the 2021 budget cap.
articles.content:
Red Bull has been handed a $7 million fine and a 10% reduction in wind-tunnel testing time for next season as punishment for breaching last year's $145 million budget cap.

articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo sets new record following Man United win against FC Sheriff - Manchester Evening News
